alert.note: Alert for Arecibo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 05 at 5:55PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following county, Arecibo. * WHEN...Until 700 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 455 PM AST, emergency management reported heavy rain in Downtown Arecibo. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. Radar indicates rainfall will continue for at least an hour. - Downtown Arecibo is the most likely place to experience flooding. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
